Source code escrow for developers

An all-in-one solution for software developers and publishers to provide source code escrow as part of service level and license agreements.

GET STARTED

Trusted partner of these great brands from around the world!

Protect your software and save your money

Software escrow secures the source code needed to recover if a supplier is no longer able to provide access or support the software you need for your business operations with an independent 3rd party.

GET STARTED

SOURCE CODE ESCROW

A source code repository "sometimes called project" is where developers store and work on software. It usually contains all versions of the code created.

DATA ESCROW

Data escrow allows you to store data as part of your escrow arrangement. Have acces not just to the application, but also the data you need to pick up where you left off.

INFORMATION ESCROW

Store intellectual property, passwords, designs, or other important information using this option.

LEARN MORE

Use automated deposit integrations

Make it easy for your developers to keep the deposited source code and data up-to-date using our library of integration options. We support all major platforms, including Github, Bitbucket, Gitlab and AzureDevops.

Automated and up-to-date deposits

Integrated with developer workflows

Who is Codekeeper for?

SOFTWARE DEVELOPERS

Gives you leverage in agreement negotiations, adds credibility to your business, creates a sense of trust and partnership, protects your intellectual property rights, and helps you avoid courts and litigation.

BUSINESSES AND ENTERPRISES

Protects you in case your software vendor goes out of business or discontinues the maintenance of mission-critical applications. It facilitates larger risk management processes and helps you meet legal requirements.

LEGAL ADVISORS

We support you in setting up source code and software escrow for your clients. Offer the full solution without compromise.

Why People Choose Codekeeper

BEST PRICE ON THE MARKET

Thanks to our powerful automation technology and unique operational model, we are able to offer you superior service for the best price on the market.

ALL OUR PLANS INCLUDE SOFTWARE, DATA & INFORMATION ESCROW

Modern web applications may require you to store more than just source code. Our plans allow you to store data and information without being charged an additional fee.

ALL INTEGRATIONS FOR AUTOMATION AND MANUAL ARE INCLUDED

Forget manual deposits. Codekeeper is fully automated and integrated with modern development workflows on SCM-platforms like Github, Bitbucket, Gitlab, and others.

Have needs that we haven’t mentioned here? Contact us.

How it works

1

SET-UP

Setting up an escrow is easy and intuitive but, if needed, our concierge is always ready to provide assistance.

2

DEPOSIT

The deposit materials in your escrow are end-to-end encrypted and fully automated. Your code is secure, and you're always in compliance.

3

ACTIVATION

Your new source code escrow is successfully activated. You can edit the details and manage other escrows as a depositor or beneficiary.

4

MANAGEMENT

Easily add your licensees as beneficiaries of the deposited source code and keep them up to date. As a licensor, you can also add suppliers and initiate new escrows in just a few clicks. Confirmations are automated, so there's no more paperwork.

Find out more about our configuration process

Verification Services

Need to provide additional assurance about the contents of the deposited code? We can validate the completeness, accuracy, and usability of materials deposited into escrow.

SEE OUR PRICING

CONTENT VERIFICATION

A profile of the content under deposit is provided in a report form.

ACTIVITY VERIFICATION

A profile of the development activity (changes) on the source code or data.

Integrations

Codekeeper integrates directly with developer workflows on Github and other popular SCM-platforms and CI/CD tools. Source code deposits into the escrow are encrypted and fully automated. You are always in compliance!

Security

ISO27001 DATA SECURITY

Our data centers adhere to the highest security standards and security policies. Security is always our first priority.

END-TO-END ENCRYPTION

Data is secured at all times, both in transit and at rest with AES256/512 encryption.

SECURE UPLOAD FOLDER

If you prefer manual upload, our upload folder system also provides you with a secure way to deposit your source code.
